Title: My Brother Is an Only Child
Writer: Antonio Pennacchi (novel), Daniele Luchetti (story and screenplay), Sandro Petraglia (story and screenplay), Stefano Rulli (story and screenplay)
Actors: Elio Germano, Riccardo Scamarcio, Angela Finocchiaro, Massimo Popolizio
Plot: Two brothers come of age in a small Italian town in the '60s and '70s.
